Articles.Content:
Me and fleet did that.Role Play is against the rules so it quickly got locked.I won't be able to finish the cruiser on time it's only a shell at this point.

Anyone remember that transport ship zekes blew up?,Well it's almost finished.

...you won't drop that it was target practice.
yea the only think now is to out part zekes
I'm just saying that I came back to it,removed weapons,and halved the part count.
I want to return to this thread but career mode is just so much fun.

wow that is an odd forum rule. What is its point? in fact there are quite a few restrictions on the forums.

Edited October 23, 2013 by camulus777

wow that is an odd forum rule. What is its point? in fact there are quite a few restrictions on the forums.

... if you wern't around when they banned RP you wouldn't understand... it got everywhere. Like plague.

Are you using reinforced armor plate attached to your structure separately to cushion the impact of any torpedo strike, all doubled up by a very flexible strut system. When a missile strikes the entire armor section flexes. Against a 3 ton missile going 400 ms its not much. I've even made a double layer with strut cushion in between and most large torps go right though.

Now I'm going to be doing armor next Video and if you guys want to show your armor tech off let me know. Armor is going to be fun>

Cruisers should be up by the end of the day. Takes like 4 hours to render each vid because of all the music and the 1080p.

oh and im going to start using this thread as a sponsor thread if that's ok with you. just gona tell people to check it out and tell them that spartwo made it and what goes on here.

If you'd like to use some of my weapons tech, feel free to ask.
Plus not to mention RP has the potential to cause argument

Plus not to mention RP has the potential to cause argument

The way to solve arguments when RP-ing is to battle.

... that migh work... (also you said something about weapon tech? )

Edited October 24, 2013 by briansun1

Why include such an element at all, if it is to cause such misery? It is not as if the aforementioned cruelty is prerequisite to creating such a system.

EDIT: WHO IS BEST PONY?

Edited October 24, 2013 by Shadow Lane
It was easier to ban all role playing rather than moderate it properly. Kind of like not eating anything instead of going on a diet.
Yay for not eating! Screw food, food is for the weak, so is sleep! I only need Kerbals, Kerbals, KERBAAAAAAAAAAALS.
I had to do an assingment for my intro to social work class where I had to go a whole week on eating less than $4.20 a day. It wasnt fun

I had to do an assingment for my intro to social work class where I had to go a whole week on eating less than $4.20 a day. It wasnt fun

Dude I do that every day. Sometimes I eat out and it costs more.
The point of the assignment was to see what is is like to live on food stamps for a week.

The point of the assignment was to see what is is like to live on food stamps for a week.

It's easy to get enough food, but it's hard to eat healthy.

It's easy to get enough food, but it's hard to eat healthy.

It was an interesting experience to say the least

Just eat bread, it's the best food, you eat bread while I eat the entertainment produced by Kerbal Space Program.

Kerbal Space Program has eaten my life, I do not sleep, I barely eat, I drink a pint of water a day, there are only Kerbals.

Edited October 24, 2013 by Shadow Lane

i have already finished it

I ate poptarts for breakfast

and sandwiches for dinner

i have already finished it

I ate poptarts for breakfast

and sandwiches for dinner

The hardest things to get are fresh meat and vegetables. You can feel fed eating only bread and grains, but you'll get sick and kill yourself that way.
hum, so no rage on ponies in this community.

hum, so no rage on ponies in this community.

Just don't be obnoxious with them or speak in pony-isms. Nopony likes that.

...hypocrite much

anyway I think the title should be changed to "The sit around and talk about random things until someone post a craft or a pic or a battle then we talk about it for a page and then go back to talking about random stuff Club"
